testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the job titles
testcase.name: Verify the add job title functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in job titles page........................................passed When the user clicks on Add button in job Titles page.......................passed Then the user is in Add Job Title Page......................................passed When user adds with parameters "Data Analyst", "Analysing the data for projects", "Analysing the data for projects".passed And the user clicks on Save button in Add Job Title Page....................passed Then the newly added "Data Analyst" and "Analysing the data for projects" should be saved and added to the Job Titles records.passed

testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the job titles
testcase.name: Verify the edit user and delete job titles functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user navigates to already created job title with "Data Analyst"...passed When the user clicks on edit button for the job with "Data Analyst".........passed Then the user is in Edit Job Title page.....................................passed When user edits with parameters "Data Scientist", "Making decisions on analysed data", "Making decisions on analysed data".passed And the user clicks on Save button in Edit Job Title page...................passed Then the records should be updated as "Data Scientist", "Making decisions on analysed data".passed And user notes the total records of the Job Titles..........................passed When the user clicks on delete button for the user with "Data Scientist" in Job Titles page.passed And the user clicks YES on Are you sure Dialog in Job Titles page...........passed Then the job Title "Data Scientist" will be deleted from the records........passed
